name: Abjure (WIS Spell)
description: DC 13. Self. End any hostile magical effects affecting Rathgamnon.

name: Abolish (WIS Spell)
description: DC 13. One target in far takes 5d8 damage.

name: Absorb (INT Spell)
description: DC 13. Near, one target. Target loses the ability to cast one random spell until completing a rest, and Mordanticus regains a lost spell of the same tier or less.

name: Agony (CHA Spell)
description: DC 14. One target in near takes 3d8 damage.

name: Alert
description: ADV on checks to detect sneaking or hiding creatures.

name: Alert
description: Cannot be surprised.

name: Ambush
description: Deal an extra die of damage when undetected.

name: Amulet of Rahm-Hotep
description: In place of attacks, teleport to a random location in the multiverse.

name: Anchor (WIS Spell)
description: DC 14. One target in far DC 18 STR or bound and anchored by chains of golden runes for 1d4 rounds.

name: Animate Plants
description: 1/day, in place of attacks. Vines grab at all enemies within double near of dragon. DC 15 DEX or unable to move 1d4 rounds.

name: Animate Tree
description: 2/day. In place of attacks, one tree within near awakens as a treant ally without this ability. Reverts back in 1 day.

name: Anoint (WIS Spell)
description: DC 12. Close. One weapon or armor becomes a magic +2 version for 10 rounds.

name: Arcane Armor (INT Spell)
description: Self. DC 12. AC 16 for 2d4 rounds.

name: Attach
description: Attach to target; bite auto-hits next round. DC 12 STR on turn to tear off.

name: Avalanche
description: All within close DC 15 STR or entombed for 1d4 rounds under mounds of earth.

name: Backstab
description: Deal x2 damage against surprised creatures.

name: Banish (INT Spell)
description: DC 14, All extradimensional creatures within near DC 15 CHA or sent back to their home planes.

name: Barb
description: Each spine sticks, dealing 1d4 damage each round. DC 12 STR check on turn to remove.

name: Barkskin (INT Spell)
description: Self. DC 13. AC becomes 15 for 5 rounds.

name: Beguile (INT Spell)
description: DC 11. Focus. One target in near of LV 2 or less is stupefied for the duration.

name: Berserk
description: When at or below 20 HP, +1 slam attack and slams deal double damage.

name: Bewilder
description: Creatures within near that see the cave brute's eyes, DC 12 CHA at start of their turn or dazed and no action.

name: Bind (INT Spell)
description: DC 12. One humanoid in far paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Blast (INT Spell)
description: DC 12. Far, one target. 2d6 damage.

name: Blast (INT Spell)
description: DC 14. One creature in near takes 5d8 damage.

name: Bless
description: 3/day, touch one target to give it a luck token.

name: Blind
description: One target within near DC 15 CHA or blinded for 1d4 days.

name: Blood Drain
description: Obe-Ixx heals 2d8 HP, target permanently loses 1d6 CON. At 0 CON, target dies and rises as a loyal vampire or vampire spawn (Obe-Ixx chooses).

name: Blood Drain
description: Attach to bitten target; auto-hit the next round. DC 9 STR on turn to remove.

name: Blood Drain
description: Vampire heals 2d6 HP and target permanently loses 1d4 CON. At 0 CON, target dies and rises as vampire or vampire spawn (vampire chooses).

name: Blood Drain
description: Vampire heals 2d6 HP and target permanently loses 1d4 CON. At 0 CON, target dies and rises as a vampire spawn.

name: Bloodlust
description: +2 damage with melee weapons (included).

name: Bottomless Bag
description: Contains 200 gear slots in magical sub-pockets. Weighs as much as a normal backpack. The Wandering Merchant can summon it to himself from anywhere by snapping his fingers.

name: Bound
description: A secret, mundane contingency (such as the touch of a feather) ends the invisible stalker's magical servitude.

name: Brutal
description: +1 damage with melee weapons (included).

name: Bug Brain (WIS Spell)
description: DC 13. Near range, one target. Target's INT drops to 1 for 1d4 rounds.

name: Camouflage
description: Hard to see in cave terrain or rocks.

name: Cancel (INT Spell)
description: DC 13. End one spell affecting a target within near.

name: Carrion Mist
description: Each time vrock is hit, 3:6 chance of carrion mist in near-sized cube centered on vrock. All enemies DC 15 CON or violent vomiting 1d4 rounds.

name: Carrion Stench
description: Living creatures DC 12 CON the first time within near or DISADV on attacks and spellcasting for 5 rounds.

name: Carrion Tracker
description: Can track dead flesh unerringly within a mile.

name: Change Shape
description: In place of attacks, transform into any similarly-sized creature.

name: Change Shape
description: In place of attacks, transform into any similarly-sized humanoid.

name: Charge
description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 tusks attack. If hit, x3 damage.

name: Charge
description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 gore attack. If hit, x3 damage.

name: Charge
description: In place of attacks, move up to double near in a straight line and make 1 horn attack. If hit, x2 damage.

name: Charge
description: Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 horn attack. If hit, x3 damage.

name: Charm
description: One humanoid in near DC 15 CHA or bewitched by cubi for 1d6 hours.

name: Charm
description: Near, one creature, DC 14 CHA or friendship for 1d8 days.

name: Charm
description: One humanoid target who can see Obe-Ixx within near, DC 15 CHA or under Obe-Ixx's control for 1d4 days.

name: Charm
description: One humanoid target who can see vampire within near, DC 15 CHA or under vampire's control for 1d4 days.

name: Clever
description: +1d4 damage when attacking with surprise.

name: Command
description: DC 18 CHA to resist an archangel's command.

name: Conjure Flames (INT Spell)
description: DC 12. One target in far takes 2d6 damage.

name: Constrict
description: Contested STR to hold target immobile for one round.

name: Contract
description: Can grant mighty boons and patronage on behalf of an archdevil in exchange for a sworn soul. ADV on related Charisma checks.

name: Corrosive
description: Wood or metal that touches the ooze dissolves on a d6 roll of 1-3.

name: Corrosive
description: Nonmagical metal that touches the ooze dissolves on a d6 roll of 1-3.

name: Corrosive
description: Metal that touches the rust monster is destroyed on a d6 roll of 1-3.

name: Crown of Darkness
description: All hostile spells are reflected at caster with a spellcasting check less than 20.

name: Crown of Fire
description: Hostile spells targeting the archangel are extreme (DC 18) to cast.

name: Crown of Gehemna
description: 3/day, cause a spell being cast within far to fail.

name: Crush
description: Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both claws.

name: Crush
description: DC 15 STR or target takes 1d8 damage.

name: Crush
description: DC 15 STR or target takes 2d8 damage.

name: Crush
description: Tentacle attacks deal double damage against objects.

name: Curse
description: DC 15 CON or target gains a magical curse, turning into a deep one over 2d10 days.

name: Curse
description: Slam damage can only be healed by level 5+ priest.

name: Darkness
description: Extinguish all light sources in near.

name: Death Bolt (INT Spell)
description: DC 15. One target of LV 9 or less within near DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Deathtouch (WIS Spell)
description: DC 12. 2d4 damage to one creature within close.

name: Deep Dweller
description: Immune to harm from fire and cold. Amphibious.

name: Desiccated
description: Can be damaged by fire. Takes x2 damage from it.

name: Dice of Truth
description: A set of three six-sided dice whose rolls cannot be magically or mundanely altered in any way.

name: Dire Shapechange
description: In place of attacks, turn into a giant bat, dire wolf, or back into regular form.

name: Disease
description: DC 15 CON or infected. DC 15 CON each day or lose 1d6 HP (can't heal). Ends on success.

name: Disease
description: DC 9 CON or 1d4 CON damage (can't heal while ill). Repeat check once per day; ends on success. Die at 0 CON.

name: Disease
description: DC 12 CON or 1d4 CON damage (can't heal while ill). Repeat check once per day; ends on success. Die at 0 CON.

name: Dissolve
description: One random piece of non-magical gear the target carries is destroyed.

name: Dodge
description: 1/day, an attack that would hit misses instead.

name: Drain
description: The target takes 1d6 WIS damage. A target reduced to 0 WIS this way swears its soul to an archdevil.

name: Drain
description: Target takes 1 STR damage. At 0 STR, target dies and becomes a shadow.

name: Drink Pain
description: Near range. DC 12 CHA to deal 2d4 damage to a creature; regain that many HP.

name: Enervate (INT Spell)
description: DC 14. Focus. One target within near is stupefied for the duration.

name: Engulf
description: DC 12 STR or trapped inside cube. Touch attack auto- hits engulfed targets each round. DC 12 STR on turn to escape. Fail checks if paralyzed.

name: Engulf
description: If a target is hit by both slams in same round, it is pulled into shambling mound's body and suffocates in 2d4 rounds. DC 15 STR on turn to escape.

name: Enlarge
description: 1/day, +1d6 damage on melee attacks and ADV on STR checks for 3 rounds.

name: Enslave
description: In place of attacks, one creature within far DC 15 WIS or aboleth controls for 1d4 rounds.

name: Execute
description: Deals x3 damage against surprised targets.

name: Explosion
description: Upon death, creatures within double near of phoenix DC 18 DEX or 10d6 damage.

name: Eyestalk Ray
description:
Each ray can shoot once per round and target one creature or an object up to 1,000 pounds (up to four on same target).
1. Charm. DC 15 CHA or become ally for 1d4 rounds.
2. Hold. DC 15 STR or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.
3. Sleep. DC 15 WIS or asleep 1d4 rounds.
4. Polymorph. DC 15 INT or turned into vermin for 1d4 rounds.
5. Cancel. DC 15 DEX or all magical effects on target end.
6. Confusion. DC 15 WIS or attack a random ally within near.
7. Telekinesis. DC 15 STR or hover target up to double near.
8. Disintegrate. DC 15 DEX or 5d8 damage (object destroyed).
9. Petrify. DC 15 CON or petrified.
10. Death. DC 15 CON or drop to 0 HP with a death timer of 1.

name: Fade (CHA Spell)
description: DC 13. Self. Become invisible for 1d4 rounds.

name: Fearless
description: Immune to morale checks.

name: Feyblood
description: ADV on DEX checks while in the natural wilds.

name: Fire Breath
description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from chimera. DC 15 DEX or 4d6 damage.

name: Fire Breath
description: Fills a double near- sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 DEX or 6d10 damage.

name: Fire Breath
description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from hell hound. DC 15 DEX or 3d8 damage. Cannot use again for 1d4 rounds.

name: Fireblast (INT Spell)
description: DC 14. 4d6 damage to all within a near- sized cube within far.

name: Fireblood
description: Fire immune.

name: Flight (INT Spell)
description: Self. DC 13. Fly double near for 5 rounds.

name: Float (INT Spell)
description: Self. DC 14. Fly double near for 5 rounds.

name: Fool's Gold (CHA Spell)
description: DC 12. Close. One small object or small group of similar objects. Turn objects into silver or gold pieces. Lasts 1 day.

name: Frost Breath
description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from winter wolf. DC 15 DEX or 3d8 damage. Cannot use again for 1d4 rounds.

name: Frostblood
description: Cold immune.

name: Gas
description: All in near DC 12 CON or blinded for 1d4 rounds.

name: Gate (WIS Spell)
description: DC 14. Open a portal at a point within near to another location on any plane. Lasts 1d6 rounds or until dismissed.

name: Gibbering
description: Creatures within near DC 12 WIS on turn or take a random action (d8): 1-3. do nothing, 4-5. move in random direction, 6-7. attack nearest creature, 8. flee.

name: Godborn
description: Hostile spells targeting the medusa are DC 15 to cast.

name: Golem
description: Immune to damage from fire, cold, electricity, or non-magical sources. Healed by acid.

name: Golem
description: Immune to damage from fire, cold, or non-magical sources. Healed by electricity.

name: Golem
description: Immune to damage from cold or non-magical sources. Healed by fire.

name: Golem
description: Immune to damage from fire, cold, electricity, or non-magical sources.

name: Gore
description: Deals an extra die of damage if it hits the same target with both tusks.

name: Grab
description: DC 15 STR or held in pincer. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

name: Grab
description: DC 18 STR or target bound in whip. 2d6 damage per round held, DC 18 STR on turn to break free. In place of fire whip attack, balor can fling a grabbed target double near on its turn.

name: Grab
description: Target is immobilized. DC 15 Strength check on turn to break free.

name: Grab
description: One target in near DC 15 STR or wrapped in grimlow's tongue and pulled into its mouth. Bite attacks automatically hit the target. Can only grab 1 target at a time. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

name: Grab
description: DC 15 STR or immobilized. Tentacle auto-hits each round. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

name: Grab
description: DC 15 STR or held. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

name: Grab
description: DC 18 STR or target held. DC 18 STR on turn to break free.

name: Grab
description: DC 15 STR or target trapped in tendril. Tendril auto- hits target next round. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

name: Grab
description: DC 12 STR or target held. DC 12 STR on turn to break free.

name: Greater Undead
description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by silver or magical sources.

name: Half-Amphibious
description: Must be submerged in water every 4 hours or suffocates.

name: Heads
description: Choose how many heads the hydra has. Each is LV 2, AC 15, HP 11, and can make 1 bite attack. A killed head sprouts into two new heads at the start of the hydra's turn unless cauterized beforehand. The hydra's LV is all the heads combined.

name: Healing Horn
description: A touch heals 2d6 HP or ends one curse or disease.

name: Healing Touch (WIS Spell)
description: DC 11. Heal one creature within close for 1d4 HP.

name: Healing Touch (WIS Spell)
description: DC 11. Heal one creature within close for 2d4 HP.

name: Hear Thoughts
description: Can hear the surface thoughts of all intelligent creatures within near.

name: Heat Aura
description: Creatures within near of phoenix at start of turn DC 15 CON or 2d6 damage.

name: Heat Aura
description: Creatures in close DC 12 CON on turn or 1d8 damage.

name: Hellfire
description: DC 18 DEX or 2d8 damage per round until flames extinguished.

name: Hellfrost (CHA Spell)
description: DC 13. All within near-sized cube extending from oni 3d6 damage.

name: Hiss (INT Spell)
description: DC 12. End one spell within far.

name: Holy Flame (WIS Spell)
description: DC 13. Self. Weapons ignite in magic flames and deal an additional 1d6 damage for 5 rounds.

name: Horn
description: All enemies in near DC 15 CHA or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Hypnotize (CHA Spell)
description: DC 13. Focus. One target in near range who can see naga is helplessly stupefied for duration.

name: Ice Aura
description: Enemies within near of rime walker DC 12 CON at start of turn or lose action.

name: Ice Breath
description: Fills a double near- sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 DEX or 4d8 damage and frozen for 1 round.

name: Illusion (CHA Spell)
description: DC 11. Create a convincing visual and/ or auditory illusion within near. Lasts until dismissed.

name: Imbue (INT Spell)
description: Self. DC 13. Staff becomes a +3 magic weapon for 10 rounds.

name: Impervious
description: Fire immune. Only damaged by magical sources.

name: Impervious
description: Fire immune.

name: Impervious
description: Only damaged by fire.

name: Impervious
description: Only damaged by magical sources.

name: Impervious
description: Only damaged by magical sources. Fire immune.

name: Impervious
description: Immune to damage from acid, cold, or fire.

name: Impervious
description: Electricity immune.

name: Impervious
description: Nightmare and its rider immune to fire.

name: Impervious
description: Immune to fire. Only damaged by magical sources.

name: Impervious
description: Only harmed by fire.

name: Impervious
description: Only damaged by magical sources. Immune to hostile spells of 3rd tier or lower.

name: Impervious
description: Immune to cold and fire.

name: Impervious
description: Immune to cold.

name: Impervious
description: Can only be damaged by magical sources.

name: Impervious
description: Fire immune. Healed by electricity.

name: Impervious
description: Cold and fire immune.

name: Impervious
description: Can only be harmed by magical sources.

name: Impervious
description: Only damaged by silver or magic sources.

name: Impervious
description: Cold immune.

name: Incorporeal
description: In place of attacks, become corporeal or incorporeal.

name: Inferno
description: All within near DC 15 DEX or 3d8 damage.

name: Ink
description: In place of attacks, ink cloud blinds all in near for 1d4 rounds.

name: Invisibility
description: 1/day, turn invisible for 3 rounds. Ends if duergar attacks.

name: Invisibility (CHA Spell)
description: DC 12. Self. Become invisible for 2d4 rounds.

name: Invisible
description: Naturally invisible.

name: Iron Hide
description: Half damage from non-magical weapons.

name: Keen Senses
description: Can't be surprised.

name: Knock
description: DC 9 STR or pushed a close distance and fall down.

name: Latch
description: Tentacles attach to hit targets, automatically hitting the next round (DC 12 STR on turn to remove 1d4 tentacles). If all four remain latched onto the same humanoid target for 1 round, the target's brain is ripped out and devoured.

name: Latch
description: Attach to bitten target; bites auto-hit next round. DC 12 STR on turn to tear off.

name: Leap
description: Jump up to near in height and double near in distance, then make 2 bite attacks.

name: Legendary
description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting Rathgamnon are DC 18 to cast.

name: Legendary
description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting the tarrasque are DC 18 to cast.

name: Legendary
description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting The Ten-Eyed Oracle are DC 18 to cast.

name: Legendary
description: Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting The Wandering Merchant are DC 18 to cast.

name: Legendary Undead
description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting Mordanticus are DC 18 to cast.

name: Legendary Undead
description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by magical sources. Hostile spells targeting Obe-Ixx are DC 18 to cast.

name: Levitate (INT Spell)
description: DC 12. Close. Focus. Hover near for duration, vertical movement only.

name: Life Drain
description: 1d4 CON damage. Death if reduced to 0 CON.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: 3/day, 5' wide line extending far from giant. All creatures in line DC 15 DEX or 5d10 damage. DISADV on check if in water.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Straight line (5' wide) extending far from kraken. DC 15 DEX or 6d6 damage.

name: Lightning Breath
description: A straight line (5' wide) extending double near from dragon. DC 15 DEX or 4d8 damage (DISADV on check if wearing metal armor).

name: Lop
description: On a natural attack roll of 18-20, behead the target.

name: Lycanthropy
description: If 12 or more damage from the same wererat, contract lycanthropy.

name: Lycanthropy
description: If 12 or more damage from the same werewolf, contract lycanthropy.

name: Magic Bolt (INT Spell)
description: DC 11. 1d4 damage to one target within far.

name: Meld
description: Step inside bonded tree.

name: Melt
description: Non-magical metal objects that touch the remorhaz melt on a d6 roll of 1-3.

name: Mesmerism
description: Can read the minds of all creatures within near. Can instantly take on the illusory appearance of any humanoid.

name: Mind Blast
description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from brain eater. DC 15 INT or 3d6 damage and paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Mind Control
description: One target in near DC 15 CHA or brain eater controls for 1d4 rounds.

name: Mirage
description: 1/day, in place of attacks. Create 3 illusory duplicates that disappear when hit. Determine randomly if an attack hits dragon or illusions.

name: Mist (CHA Spell)
description: DC 13. Self. Turn into mist that can fly double near. Lasts 2d4 rounds.

name: Mithralskin (INT Spell)
description: Self. DC 14. AC becomes 18 for 5 rounds.

name: Moonbite Properties
description: +2 _greatsword_, thrown weapon, returns after being thrown. Spells to heal damage it inflicts are DC 15 to cast.

name: Moonlight Aura
description: Hostile spells targeting the principi are DC 15.

name: Necrosis
description: DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP. Healing spells are DC 15 to cast on target while at 0 HP to due to this effect.

name: Necrosis
description: DC 15 CON or drop to 0 HP. Healing spells are DC 15 to cast on target while at 0 HP due to this effect.

name: Null (INT Spell)
description: Self. DC 14. Hostile spells targeting lich are DC 18 to cast. Lasts 1d4 rounds.

name: Oath
description: 3/day, ADV on a roll made in service of knight's order.

name: Omens (WIS Spell)
description: DC 12. Self. ADV on all actions for 1d4 rounds.

name: Pack Hunter
description: Deals +1 damage while an ally is close.

name: Paralysis
description: DC 15 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Paralyze
description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Parry
description: Trade 2 longsword attacks next round to deflect a melee attack that would hit.

name: Permanent Death
description: Cannot be permanently killed unless a wish spell is cast on it while it is at 0 HP.

name: Petrify
description: Any creature that touches the basilisk or meets its gaze, DC 15 CON or petrified.

name: Petrify
description: DC 12 CON or petrified.

name: Petrify
description: Any creature (including medusa) who looks directly at medusa, DC 15 CON or petrified.

name: Petrifying Breath
description: Fills a near- sized cube extending from gorgon. DC 15 CON or petrified (gorgons immune).

name: Phalanx
description: +1 to attacks and AC when in close range of an allied hobgoblin.

name: Phantoms
description: 1/day, in place of attacks. Create 3 illusory duplicates that disappear when hit. Determine randomly if an attack hits cloaker or illusions.

name: Phase
description: Once per round, become corporeal or incorporeal.

name: Phase (INT Spell)
description: DC 13. Self. Teleport up to one mile.

name: Phylactery
description: Can't be killed while spirit vessel (an object) is intact.

name: Phylactery
description: Cannot be killed while spirit vessel (a diamond) is intact.

name: Poison
description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Poison
description: DC 15 CON or fall into natural, deep sleep for 1d8 hours.

name: Poison
description: DC 15 CON or target's eyes go jet black and it turns on its allies for 1d4 rounds. DC 15 WIS on turn to end effect.

name: Poison
description: DC 12 CON or fitful sleep for 1d4 hours.

name: Poison
description: DC 15 CON or sleep.

name: Poison
description: DC 15 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Poison
description: DC 12 CON or fall into deep sleep for 1d4 hours.

name: Poison
description: DC 15 CON or drop to 0 hit points in 1d4 rounds.

name: Poison
description: DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Poison
description: DC 9 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Poison
description: DC 12 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Poison
description: DC 18 CON or go to 0 HP with a death timer of 1.

name: Poison
description: DC 12 CON or go to 0 HP in 1d4 rounds.

name: Poison
description: DC 9 CON or take 1d4 damage.

name: Poison
description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 hours.

name: Poison
description: DC 12 CON or drop to 0 HP in 1d4 rounds.

name: Poison
description: DC 15 CON or take 2d10 damage.

name: Poison Breath
description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 CON or 3d8 damage.

name: Poison Breath
description: All within near, DC 15 CON or 8d6 damage.

name: Poison Web
description: One target stuck in place and 1d4 damage/round. DC 12 DEX on turn to escape.

name: Portent (WIS Spell)
description: DC 14. Lasts 2d4 rounds. One target in near has advantage or disadvantage on all attack rolls and checks.

name: Possess
description: Must be corporeal. One target, close range. Contested CHA check. If ghost wins, it inhabits target's body and controls it for 2d4 rounds.

name: Pull
description: In place of a tendril attack, pull a grabbed target a near distance.

name: Rage
description: 1/day, immune to morale checks, +1d4 damage (3 rounds).

name: Rampage
description: In place of attacks, move far in a straight line and make one bite attack. On a hit, triple damage.

name: Rebirth
description: A red-hot egg remains after death. Phoenix hatches from it in 1d4 days.

name: Rebuke (WIS Spell)
description: DC 13. Focus. Chaotic creatures cannot attack priest or come within near range for duration.

name: Reckoning
description: Any creature who steals from The Wandering Merchant develops a curse. Over the next 2d8 days, that creature turns into a cockatrice. This curse can only be lifted by a wish spell or by returning the stolen goods.

name: Reflective Carapace
description: Immune to rays, blasts, or bolts of energy. 1:6 chance these are reflected back at their originator.

name: Regenerate
description: Regains 2d6 HP on its turn unless its wounds are cauterized with fire or acid.

name: Regenerate
description: Regains 2d6 HP on its turn unless its wounds are cauterized with acid.

name: Regeneration
description: Regains 4d10 lost HP at the beginning of its turn.

name: Relentless
description: If zombie reduced to 0 HP by a non-magical source, DC 15 CON to go to 1 HP instead.

name: Restore
description: In place of attacks, touch one creature to remove a curse, affliction, or heal 3d8 HP.

name: Riddle (WIS Spell)
description: DC 12. One target in far DC 15 INT or stupefied 1d4 rounds.

name: Roar
description: In place of attacks, all creatures who can hear within far DC 18 CHA or be rendered blind and speechless for 1d4 days.

name: Roar
description: In place of attacks, all creatures who can hear within far DC 18 CHA or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Rubbery
description: Half damage from stabbing weapons.

name: Savage
description: ADV on attacks against creatures below half their HP.

name: Scorpion Sting (CHA Spell)
description: DC 11. Near range, one target. 1d6 damage and target has DISADV on next attack roll or check.

name: Scream
description: Creatures who hear in double near DC 12 CHA or paralyzed for 1d4 rounds.

name: Screech
description: Enemies within double near DC 15 WIS or DISADV on attacks and checks 1d4 rounds.

name: Screech
description: All enemies in double near DC 12 WIS or DISADV on checks and attacks for 1d4 rounds.

name: Sever
description: On a natural attack roll of 18+, the attack also severs a random limb. 1d6: 1. Head, 2-4. Arm, 5-6. Leg.

name: Shadow Leap (INT Spell)
description: Self. DC 14. Teleport up to 100 miles.

name: Shapechange
description: Instantly change to look like any other humanoid.

name: Shapechange
description: In place of attacks, turn into a bat, wolf, or back into regular form.

name: Shapeshift
description: In place of attacks, turn into any humanoid or back into original form.

name: Sigil of Doom (INT Spell)
description: DC 15. One target of LV 9 or less within near DC 15 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Skitter (WIS Spell)
description: DC 12. Self. Climb like a spider for 5 rounds.

name: Slippery
description: Hostile spells targeting the leprechaun are DC 15 to cast.

name: Slow
description: Far range, one target. DC 15 CON or speed halved 1d4 rds.

name: Smog Breath
description: Fills a near-sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 CON or 2d10 damage and blinded for 1 round.

name: Snare (INT Spell)
description: DC 13. Focus. One humanoid target within near paralyzed for duration.

name: Snuff (WIS Spell)
description: DC 12. Extinguish all light sources (even magical) within near.

name: Song
description: Enemies who can hear within double near DC 12 CHA or dazed and drawn to harpy for 1d4 rounds. Immune for 1 day if passed check.

name: Song
description: Enemies who can hear within double near DC 15 CHA or paralyzed 1d4 rounds. Immune for 1 day if passed check.

name: Soulbind
description: All targets within near DC 20 CHA or fall under control of archdevil for 1d4 rounds. DC 20 CHA on turn to end the effect.

name: Spider Swarm (CHA Spell)
description: DC 12. A spider swarm appears within near. Stays 1d4 rounds. Follows sorcerer's commands.

name: Spikes
description: Manticores have 4d6 tail spikes. They regrow each day.

name: Split
description: If cut or chopped, split into two smaller oozes (divide remaining HP between both). Can split up to four times.

name: Statue
description: When standing still, looks exactly like a suit of armor.

name: Stealthy
description: ADV on checks to sneak and hide.

name: Stealthy
description: ADV on DEX checks to sneak and hide.

name: Steam Breath
description: Fills a double near-sized cube extending from dragon. DC 15 DEX or 4d12 damage.

name: Stick
description: DC 15 STR or adhere to target; auto-hit with bite. DC 15 STR on turn to remove.

name: Stink Bomb (WIS Spell)
description: DC 12. One target within far 2d4 damage and DC 12 CON or DISADV on next check/attack.

name: Stone Hide
description: Half damage from stabbing and cutting weapons.

name: Stone Meld
description: 2/day, underground only. Turn invisible for 3 rounds.

name: Storm
description: Seas become violently turbulent in 1 mile radius around kraken. Lasts 2d4 rounds. Seaborne vessels have a 1:6 chance of capsizing each round.

name: Stormblood
description: Electricity immune.

name: Strange Lands
description: The Wandering Merchant does not suffer any ill effects from the natural environment he does not wish to suffer.

name: Strangle
description: Deals x2 damage against surprised creatures.

name: Stumpy
description: ADV on STR checks to grab or drag other creatures.

name: Summon Bear (INT Spell)
description: DC 14. Summon a loyal brown bear that appears within near. It stays for 5 rounds.

name: Summon Cobra (INT Spell)
description: DC 13. Summon 1d4 loyal cobras that appear within near. They leave in 1d4 rounds.

name: Summon Spiders (WIS Spell)
description: DC 14. Summon 2d4 loyal giant spiders that appear within near. They stay for 5 rounds.

name: Sunblind
description: Blinded in bright light.

name: Supreme Undead
description: Immune to morale checks. Only damaged by magical sources.

name: Swallow
description: On a natural attack roll of 18-20, target is swallowed. Total darkness inside and 2d10 damage per round. Worm regurgitates all swallowed if dealt at least 20 damage in one round to the inside of its gullet.

name: Swallow
description: On a natural attack roll of 18-20, target is swallowed. Total darkness inside and 2d10 damage per round. Remorhaz regurgitates all swallowed if dealt at least 20 damage in one round to the inside of its gullet.

name: Swallow
description: DC 18 STR or swallowed whole. Total darkness inside and 4d10 damage per round. Tarrasque regurgitates all swallowed if dealt at least 30 damage in one round to the inside of its gullet.

name: Telepathic
description: Read the thought,s of all creatures within far.

name: Telepathic
description: Speak mentally with creatures within double near.

name: Telepathy
description: Can secretly hear the surface thoughts of all humanoids within near.

name: Tendrils
description: Four total. AC 18 each. 4+ damage to one severs it.

name: Terrify
description: A creature who first sees her true form DC 15 CHA or DISADV on attacks 1d4 rounds.

name: Thick Fur
description: Cold immune.

name: Thunderclap (INT Spell)
description: DC 13. Fills a near-sized cube extending from druid. Creatures within are thrown 2d20 feet in a random direction.

name: Time Bend (WIS Spell)
description: DC 14. One target in near frozen in time for 1d4 rounds.

name: Time Stop (WIS Spell)
description: DC 15. Self. Time freezes for everyone except Rathgamnon for 1d4 rounds. Everything that occurs during the time freeze happens simultaneously when the spell ends.

name: Tongue
description: 1 creature in near DC 12 DEX or pulled to close range.

name: Toxin
description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Toxin
description: DC 15 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Toxin
description: DC 9 CON or paralyzed 1d4 rounds.

name: Toxin
description: DC 12 CON or unconscious for 1d4 rounds.

name: Toxin
description: DC 12 CON or paralyzed for 1d4 rounds.

name: Tracking
description: Can always sense the direction of its chosen quarry.

name: True Name (INT Spell)
description: DC 15. Near. Learn the *True Name* of target.

name: Truesight
description: Can see all invisible creatures and objects.

name: Undead
description: Immune to morale checks.

name: Unmake (WIS Spell)
description: DC 13. One target in far takes 3d8 damage.

name: Ur-Vampire
description: Must sleep in sarcophagus at least once per moon cycle or loses 2d8 HP per day that cannot heal until sleeping in sacrophagus. Takes 3d8 damage each round while in direct sunlight. Cannot be killed unless pierced through heart while at 0 HP with a wooden stake carved from a tree from the Tal-Yool jungle.

name: Vampire
description: Must sleep in a coffin daily or loses 2d6 HP each day that can't be healed until resting in coffin. Takes 3d8 damage each round while in direct sunlight. Cannot be killed unless pierced through heart with a wooden stake while at 0 HP.

name: Venom
description: DC 9 CON or go to 0 HP.

name: Venom (INT Spell)
description: DC 12. One target in far takes 2d8 damage.

name: Void Step (INT Spell)
description: Self and up to 4 willing targets. DC 15. Teleport up to 100 miles.

name: Wall of Flame
description: 1/day, 20' high curtain of fire, double near length. Touching it deals 4d8 damage. Lasts 2d4 rounds.

name: Water Spout
description: Fills a near-sized cube within far. DC 15 STR or creatures inside flung 2d100 feet in a random direction.

name: Weakness
description: A crossbow bolt under the effects of the holy weapon spell kills the rakshasa.

name: Web (WIS Spell)
description: DC 13. A near- sized cube of webs within far immobilizes all inside it for 5 rounds. DC 15 STR on turn to break free.

name: Whirlpool
description: All within close DC 15 STR or immobilized inside water elemental (treat as underwater). DC 15 STR on turn to escape.

name: Whirlwind
description: Transform into a lashing tornado. All enemies within near DC 18 DEX or thrown 2d100 feet in a random direction.

name: Whirlwind
description: All within close DC 15 DEX or flung 2d20 feet in random direction.

name: Whispers (CHA Spell)
description: DC 12. Hostile spells cast on one target in near are DC 9 for 1d4 rounds.

name: Whispers (INT Spell)
description: DC 14. Focus. All enemies within near of viperian wizard have DISADV on spellcasting checks for the duration.

name: Wish
description: Cast wish once a week for a mortal, no spellcasting check.

name: Wither (INT Spell)
description: DC 14. 4d8 damage to enemies within a near-sized cube centered on lich.
